info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 10:58AM EST until January 07 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of from 5 to 12 inches in a narrow band from near Holland through Saugatuck to near Fennville. Elsewhere expect 1 to 3 inches of new snow by late afternoon. * WHERE...Ottawa, Allegan and Van Buren counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A very narrow but persistent snow band is slowly sinking south from near Holland to Fennville. This snow band will start moving back northward by mid afternoon to be located just north of Holland when it starts to weaken by late this afternoon. Snowfall rates of 1 to 3 inches an hour are expected in this snowband.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
